snippet: Diagnostic strips made by six companies “cannot be recommended” because of high false-negative rates, according to scientists in Germany....
abstract: Study by Friedrich-Loeffler Institute scientists published in journal PLoS Neglected Tropical Disease finds six rapid test rabies kits unsatisfactory due to high number of false-negative results.
lead_paragraph: Diagnostic strips made by six companies “cannot be recommended” because of high false-negative rates, according to scientists in Germany.

headline.main: Rabies Test Strips Are Found to Be Unsatisfactory
